Question: How can i transfer money / How to recharge my wallet?
Answer: Hello, please clarify, which transfer method do you want to know about? Options are: transfer fiat to Tezro, transfer crypto to Tezro, transfer money to another Tezro user, withdraw crypto from Tezro, withdraw fiat from Tezro.

Question: Transfer fiat to Tezro
Answer: Hello, you can recharge your Tezro fiat account from any card, to do so open your wallets (from the bottom menu), click on fiat button (2 cards on top), add card to Tezro and you can recharge your fiat balance anytime from that card, or you can also add another card if you want!

Question: Transfer crypto to Tezro
Answer: Hello, to top up your crypto balance go to your wallets (from the bottom menu), choose crypto you want to replenish, click on "Get" on the bottom of the chosen crypto wallet. There you can copy your wallet number to transfer crypto to Tezro. You could also enter the sum and scan QR code to easy transfer from another wallet, or share this QR to any social network for other people to top up your balance

Question: Transfer money to another Tezro user
Answer: Hello, to transfer money to another Tezro user, open the chat with them and click on the Bitcoin button on the bottom-left. Choose the currency you want to transfer, enter the sum and click arrow to send it. The money inside Tezro will be transfered instantly!

Question: Withdraw crypto from Tezro
Answer: Hello, to withdraw crypto from Tezro go to your wallets (from the bottom menu), choose the currency you want to withdraw and click Send. There you can enter the sum and wallet address to withdraw crypto. Make sure to check the address you enter for any errors, or the currency could be lost forever!

Question: Withdraw fiat from Tezro
Answer: Hello, the option to withdraw fiat is unavailable at the moment, stay tuned for the updates, we are working on it!

Question: Which currencies do you have
Answer: Hello, to check the list of the active currencies open your wallents (from the bottom menu), you can always check the supported currencies there.

Question: I found a bug, what do i do?
Answer: Hello, to report a bug contact support, using the button below and explain under which circumstances you are encountering this error and which client you are using (ios, android, web, desktop)?

Question: What does escrow mean?
Answer: Hello, escrow is the secured type of transactions used inside Tezro. You can transfer the money for any service to another user using escrow. User will recieve money only after your confirmation of completing the provided service.

Question: how can i add my friend?
Answer: Hello, you can add a contact to your list by phone number (contact button in the upper menu, then click "+" button), or find them by username from the chat list, then send them a message in Tezro to start chatting.

Question: how can i invite my friend to Tezro?
Answer: Hello, you can invite your friends to Tezro from the contacts screen in the upper menu, click on the "invite friend" button there and by using "share Tezro" option you can send an invite link to any social network to your friends.

Question: Why do i have to enter pin-code all the time?
Answer: Hello, we ask users to confirm all the currency operation by entering pin-code for security reasons, if someone steals your device it will be impossible to withdraw money without knowing the current pin-code.

Question: Why do i create new pin-code every login?
Answer: Hello, for every new authorisation we ask users to create another pin-code for security reasons. Pin-code is a temporary password used for current session only.

Question: What are gift cards used for?
Answer: Hello, you can create gift cards and send it to your friend to invite them to Tezro and become your subscriber. Click on the gift button in the upper menu and start sending gifts!

Question: Which devices Tezro supports?
Answer: Hello, you can install mobile version of Tezro on android, ios or use desktop version designed for macOS. Also there is web-version optimized for windows PC.

Question: Is there any transaction restrictions?
Answer: Hello, there is no restrictions, you can transfer any currency supported in Tezro anywhere and to anyone.

Question: Is there any commission to transactions? / How much do i have to pay for transactions?
Answer: Hello, there is no comission for transfers inside Tezro. To learn about outside commissions ask directly: top-up comissions, withdraw crypto commission, recharge fiat commission, withdraw fiat comission

Question: crypto top-up commission
Answer: Hello, there is no commission in Tezro to top-up your crypto wallet, you only need to pay for the blockchain commission to create transaction.

Question: withdraw crypto commission
Answer: Hello, there is a small comission in Tezro for crypto withdrawal of 0.01%

Question: fiat recharge commission
Answer: Hello, there is no commission in Tezro for recharging operation, however, there is a small fee taken by the bank. You can check the exact amount when you try to recharge Tezro wallet from card

Question: fiat withdraw comission
Answer: Hello, the option to withdraw fiat is unavailable at the moment, stay tuned for the updates, we are working on it!

Question: can't find a person, what's the problem?
Answer: Hello, if you cannot find a person knowing the username make sure there the spelling is correct. Also maybe the person is hidden from search. You can enable this option for yourself from the settings > security menu.

Question: this ... doesn't work
Answer: Hello, if the problem you describing repeats inself please contact the operator using the button below.

Question: can i change my username / nickname?
Answer: Hello, to change your username go to the settings, open your profile (button with your first and last names, phone number and username) click on the username to open the edit username screen

Question: how can i restore my pin-code
Answer: Hello, your pin-code is unique for each session, if you forgot you pin-code, try to logout and create another pin-code after entering your seed-phrase / scanning QR

Question: how can i restore my seed-phrase
Answer: Hello, you can check your seed-phrase in the settings menu, click on seed-phrase button there and enter your current pin-code to reveal the phrase. Make sure you copy it somewhere safe afterwards. In case you forgot your pin-code, unfortunatelly your seed-phrase can no longer be restored

Question: I made the transaction by mistake, can i cancel it
Answer: Hello, please try to contact the operator with the details of the transaction. Tezro will try to help you in than case. To make sure you can always cancel your transaction use escrow.

Question: I made the transaction by mistake what can i do now
Answer: Hello, please try to contact the operator with the details of the transaction. Tezro will try to help you in than case. To make sure you can always cancel your transaction use escrow.

Question: How can i exсhange my currencies
Answer: Hello, to exhange your currencies you can try our Exchange chat. The you can create offers to another users, or try the convert function to convert one currency to another inside Tezro

Question: Can i pay from Tezro in shop
Answer: Hello, you can only pay in shop's connected to Tezro, to confirm please ask the shop representative

Question: What does cryptocurrency mean
Answer: Hello, cryptocurrency is a form of payment that can be exchanged online for goods and services. Many companies have issued their own currencies, often called tokens, and these can be traded specifically for the goods or services that the company provides.

Question: What bot can do
Answer: Hello, i can answer simple questions about Tezro. Try asking me about commissions, seed-phrase, supporting devices, gift cards or any other Tezro modules.

Question: Somebody once told me
Answer: The world is gonna roll me... anyways, can i help you?

Question: Is this a bot?
Answer: Hello, yes, i am a programm, designed for answering simple questions about commissions, seed-phrase, supporting devices, gift cards or any other Tezro modules.

Question: How can i contact operator
Answer: Hello, to request an operator use the button in the bottom menu. Your question will be answered shortly.

Question: Contact real support
Answer: Hello, to request an operator use the button in the bottom menu. Your question will be answered shortly.

Question: Dark theme in app
Answer: Hello, to activate dark theme go to setting (gear icon) > appearance and choose dark color theme.

Question: What are verification limits
Answer: Hello, to check your withdraw verification limits proceed to settings > verification level and click on "!" in the upper menu. You can also read about verification documents there.

Question: App version
Answer: Hello, to check your app version navigate to the settings (gear icon) and scroll to the bottom. App version should be shown there.

Question: How is your system working
Answer: Hello, Tezro is working just fine, do you have any specific questions?

Question: How are you
Answer: Hello, i'm fine, what about you?

Question: Why sometimes the app work very slow
Answer: Hello, we are working on optimisation of our app, please contact the operator using the button below and tell us where exactly it is slow? Under which conditions do you encounter the slow work?

Question: Can you check please
Answer: Hello, to request answering specific question pls contact the operator using the button below.

Question: What is your name
Answer: Hello, i have no name, can i help you?

Question: can i email someone
Answer: Hello, you can send messages to any email address from Tezro. To do so click on the mail icon in the bottom menu, then click on pencil on top, enter email address, subject and your message. Email will be sent shortly after.

Question: how is exchange working
Answer: Hello, in exchange chat you can create exchange offers to other users. They can make offers in response and after both of you accept them the trade will happen.

Question: how much is 2x2
Answer: Hello 2x2=5, i am not a calculator allright? Any other questions?

Question: how to make money
Answer: Hello, to make money in Tezro there are a lot of options. You can trade crypto in exchange, open a shop in Markets or sell your assets on Auction. Soon you will be also able to invest money in Tezro DeFi.

Question: buy coins
Answer: Hello, you can recharge your Tezro fiat account from any card and then try to make an exchange offer in exchange chat to receive your first crypto.

Question: buy crypto
Answer: Hello, you can recharge your Tezro fiat account from any card and then try to make an exchange offer in exchange chat to receive your first crypto.

Question: change to
Answer: Hello, you can use exchange chat to create offers using crypto and fiat currencies. Other users should create responding offers to trade you currencies.

Question: pay for goods
Answer: Hello, you can buy goods in Tezro Market or on Auctions using your Tezro wallet, or you can just bind a card to Tezro and pay from it.

Question: change my email address
Answer: Hello, you cannot change your email address after registration in Tezro. This decision is permanent.

Question: change username
Answer: Hello, you can change your username anytime from your user profile.

Question: how to use auctions
Answer: Hello, you can sell your assets on Tezro auction. There are 2 types of distribution: 100% auction type where you sell you completely selling your asset and 49% exchange type when users can buy each percent for a different price. On auction there is a timer, when it expires the max bid wins and the ownership transfers to winner. On burse the ownership remains the same, but users can resell owned percents again and again for a different price.
